# elestio Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
# Initialize the provider with the login information.
provider "elestio" {
  email     = "admin@example.com"
  api_token = "abc123"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `api_token` (String, Sensitive) Elestio API token
- `email` (String) Elestio email address
